subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With the Knicks on the verge of elimination from the playoff race, the trade that sent Eddy Curry from Chicago to New York 18 months ago could haunt the Knicks long after their season is over.
snippet: With the Knicks on the verge of elimination from the playoff race, the trade that sent Eddy Curry from Chicago to New York 18 months ago could haunt the Knicks long after their season is over.
